DataElement.preferredDefinition: The sum of a set of numeric values for the Curie mIBG score.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Tumor Results Original Result Clinical Study Sponsor Defined Number
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The outcome of the tumor results assessment as originally received or collected._An entity such as an individual, company, institution, group, or organization which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. The sponsor does not actually conduct the investigation unless the sponsor is a sponsor-investigator. A person other than an individual (e.g., corporation or agency) that uses one or more of its own employees to conduct research it has initiated is considered to be a sponsor, and the employees are considered to be investigators. [21 CFR P.50.3(k)] [21 CFR P.50.102(j)] [21 CFR P.312.3]_Clearly characterized or delimited._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

Concepts.definition: The outcome of the tumor results assessment as originally received or collected.

An entity such as an individual, company, institution, group, or organization which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. The sponsor does not actually conduct the investigation unless the sponsor is a sponsor-investigator. A person other than an individual (e.g., corporation or agency) that uses one or more of its own employees to conduct research it has initiated is considered to be a sponsor, and the employees are considered to be investigators. [21 CFR P.50.3(k)] [21 CFR P.50.102(j)] [21 CFR P.312.3]
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
